query:
ALTER TABLE customers 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS banned BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS bannedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS bannedReason TEXT NULL
